name: mic-elms
description: A comprehensive mobile-friendly MERN stack application for managing employee leave requests in educational institutions. Features role-based access control (Admin, HOD, Employee), multi-level approval workflow, real-time status tracking, analytics dashboard, and Excel report generation. Built with React 18, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install

author: MIC College
